title: Sampler, 1833
medium:
Medium: linen embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in chain, buttonhole, threaded herringbone, back, and knot stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Twenty buttonholes and an insertion of needle lace in the center.  Decorative hem.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1833.
1833. Medium: linen embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in chain, buttonhole, threaded herringbone, back, and knot stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-288.
